name: Mewing
one_liner: A technique of tongue posture used to define the jawline, often signaled by a 'shhh' finger motion.
meaning: Improving facial aesthetics; commonly used as a meme to dismiss someone ('I can't talk, I'm mewing').
usage: To signify you are working on your looks or to rudely silence someone.
example_lines: Finger to the lips, I'm mewing
Sharp jaw, been mewing since day one
do_not_use_if: You are having a serious conversation
You don't know what it means
